hero.description: Stunning design, powerful performance, and measurable results. We are Digilevate, your partners in digital growth and online success.

services_section.description: From stunning starter sites to full e-commerce solutions, we have the perfect package to elevate your digital presence and grow your business.
services_section.support_description: Keep your website secure, updated, and performing at its best with our monthly maintenance service.

portfolio_section.description: Explore our portfolio of successful projects. Each website is crafted with precision, designed for performance, and built to convert visitors into customers.

physiosteo_montagna.title: Physiosteo Montagna
physiosteo_montagna.description: A modern and professional website for a physiotherapy and osteopathy practice. The site clearly presents their services, team, and philosophy, with a focus on personalized and holistic treatment. It's designed to be welcoming and informative for new and existing patients.

personal_portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
personal_portfolio.description: A sleek and personal portfolio for a software engineer. It showcases his skills, experience, and a variety of projects in a clean and organized manner. The site acts as a digital resume and a testament to his passion for technology.

about_section.description: Two passionate tech entrepreneurs on a mission to help businesses succeed in the digital world.
about_section.why_description1: We founded Digilevate out of a clear observation: Many great companies are losing customers due to outdated websites and a lack of digital visibility. Their full potential remains untapped, which is what we change for them.
about_section.why_description2: Our passion is to merge cutting-edge technology with strategic design. We don't just build websites – we create digital platforms that deliver measurable results and present your brand in the best possible light.
about_section.list_item1: Proven Expertise: With combined experience from demanding projects at Google and Swisscom.
about_section.list_item2: At the Forefront: Experts in the latest web technologies and design trends.
about_section.list_item3: Over 10 years of combined experience in web development and IT.

founder_profile.loris_description: As Strategy & Growth Director, Loris is the strategic mind of Digilevate. He develops the company's long-term vision, identifies new growth opportunities, and writes code to create innovative solutions. His role is to ensure that Digilevate grows sustainably and meets the needs of the market.
founder_profile.alessio_description: As Creative Development Director, Alessio combines innovative design with the latest technology. He is the driving force behind the creative and technological implementation of our projects, ensuring that every website is not only aesthetically pleasing but also functional and user-friendly.

testimonials_section.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients have to say about working with Digilevate.

sarah_johnson.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah_johnson.content: Digilevate transformed our online presence completely. Our new website not only looks stunning but has increased our leads by 300%. Their attention to detail and professional approach is unmatched.

michael_chen.name: Michael Chen
michael_chen.content: Working with Loris and Alessio was a game-changer. They didn't just build us a website – they created a powerful marketing tool that converts visitors into customers. Highly recommended!

emily_rodriguez.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily_rodriguez.content: The team at Digilevate exceeded our expectations. They understood our vision perfectly and delivered a website that truly represents our brand. The ongoing support has been exceptional.

contact_section.thank_you_message: We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact_section.description: Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together. Get your free consultation and detailed proposal today.

footer.description: Elevating your digital presence through beautiful design and robust technology.
